constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 28 (Friday, February 11, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RASKIN:
H.R. 6720.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article 1, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H1120]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 497.

title: To authorize the Thomas Paine Memorial Association to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs, and for other purposes.
